text: The place is OK. I order online and pickup. I have never had a bad pizza. Checkout is always quick and the people seem nice.

text: Their lunch buffet is priced right, the new pizzas came out quickly, and there was an entire vat of hot marinara available for the bread sticks and pizza crusts. On the downside, the salad bar was not as fresh as it could've been, and the …More

text: Great evening shared with my daughter. Great wings. Pizza is always good. Looking forward to trying the Lunch Buffet week days.

text: Pizza was fresh and hot! The employee searched for a discount and gave me a great deal. Very friendly staff. Pretty nice experience for just getting pizza lol !

text: Still one of the best pizza places around.  You just can't beat a Supreme Pan pizza and an order of bread sticks with that excellent dipping sauce!  You can't rush perfection...  your food will be made to order so prepare to wait.  Deliciousness is coming!
